attributes.action: Make overtime payment tax free for people earning less than £25,000 a year.
attributes.background:
Low pay workers who have too do overtime too top up  weekly wage too make ends meet. Paying no tax on overtime will help.
I work in London Hyde Park for a contractor .
Horticulture is low payed so have too do a lot of overtime just too live .so having a holiday and stuff is a luxury for some!!
